data.event: JCSAT-3 and JCSAT-1B are the satellites used by AI<sup>3</sup> Project.
WIDE Project and JSAT Corporation kicked off AI<sup>3</sup> Project as a working group in WIDE Project.
The first earth station of AI<sup>3</sup> Project. Nara Institute of Science and Technology (NAIST) served as the hub of AI<sup>3</sup> Project using Ku-band links.
Ku-band earth station in Institut Teknologi Bandung (ITB) started.
Ku-band earth station in Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST) started.
Ku-band earth station in Asian Institute of Technology (AIT) started.
Complete the construction of Phase I of AI<sup>3</sup> Project
The plan for AI<sup>3</sup> Project Phase II Network started.
The AI<sup>3</sup> earth station at HKUST stopped operation.
The AI<sup>3</sup> started IPv6 network test-bed.
Ku-band link operations moved from JCSAT-3 to JCSAT-1B.
Keio University Shonan Fujisawa Campus (SFC) started to serve as the hub for C-band links.
C-band earth station in Temasek Polytechnic (TP) started operation.
C-band earth station in Advanced Science and Technology Institute (ASTI) started operation.
C-band earth station in Universiti Sains Malaysia (USM) started opreation.
C-band earth station in Institute of Information Technology (IOIT) started.
AI<sup>3</sup> unidirectional link (UDL) operation started using 6Mbps of bandwidth on C-band. UDL operation includes IPv4 Multicast service using DVMRP as the multicast routing protocol.
WIDE Project and Keio University initiated the School on the Internet Asia (SOI Asia) Project.

event.title: SOI Asia 1st RO site at NUOL

data.event: SOI Asia Project started its first Receive Only (RO) site in National University of Laos (NUOL).

event.title: SOI Asia RO site at UCSY

data.event: University of Computer Studies Yangoon (UCSY) started its SOI Asia RO site.

event.title: SOI Asia RO site at Chula

data.event: Chulalongkorn University started its SOI Asia RO site.

event.title: SOI Asia RO site at Unibraw

data.event: Brawijaya University (Unibraw) started its SOI Asia RO site.

event.title: SOI Asia RO site at Unhas

data.event: Hasanuddin University (Unhas) started its SOI Asia RO site.

event.title: SOI Asia RO site at Unsrat

data.event: Sam Ratulangi University (Unsrat) started its SOI Asia RO site.

event.title: SOI Asia RO site at AIT

data.event: AIT started its SOI Asia RO site.

event.title: SOI Asia RO site at IOIT

data.event: IOIT started its SOI Asia RO site.

event.title: SOI Asia RO site at ASTI

data.event: ASTI started its SOI Asia RO site.
SOI Asia Project conducted its 1st real-time lecture series titled IT Special Lectures.
SOI Asia Project held its 1st Operators Workshop in Keio SFC.
AI<sup>3</sup> organized a workshop in parallel to SAINT 2003 in Florida, USA.
APNIC allocated a /32 IPv6 prefix for AI<sup>3</sup> Project.
SOI Asia Project held its first Steering Commitee meeting in Tokyo.
The UDL bandwidth increased from 6Mbps to 9Mbps.
AI<sup>3</sup> switched the multicast routing from DVMRP to PIM-SM.
AI<sup>3</sup> stopped the operation of Ku-band links, and started the transition process to C-band.
AIT started operating a C-band earth station, completing the transition process from Ku-band.
ITB started operating a C-band earth station, completing the transition process from Ku-band.

event.title: SOI Asia RO site at MUST

data.event: Mongolia University of Science and Technology (MUST) started its SOI Asia RO site.

event.title: SOI Asia RO site at ITC

data.event: Institute of Technology of Cambodia (ITC) started its SOI Asia RO site.

event.title: SOI Asia RO site at BUET

data.event: Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology (BUET) started its SOI Asia RO site.

event.title: SOI Asia RO site at PSU

data.event: Prince of Songkla University (PSU) started its SOI Asia RO site.

event.title: SOI Asia RO site at CRMA

data.event: Chulachomklao Royal Military Academy (CRMA) started its SOI Asia RO site.
SOI Asia Project held a special symposium titled Sharing Knowledge Across Borders-Tsunami: Lessons Learned and Universities' Role. Prime Minister of Japan, Junichiro Koizumi joined the symposium.
AI<sup>3</sup> started IPv6 multicast network operation using PIM-SM as the multicast routing protocol.
Syiah Kuala University (Unsyiah) started its SOI Asia site, including a bidirectional link to SFC.
SOI Asia held its 1st real-time class using IPv6 multicast, marking the completion of IPv6 migration.
Human Resource Development Program of SOI Asia, called SOI Asia Internship Program, started with the arrival of the 1st batch interns: Alwin of Unsrat and Soe Soe of UCSY.
The UDL bandwidth increased from 9Mbps to 13Mbps.
SOI Asia Project held its 1st Global e-Workshop, which is a workshop for operations using SOI Asia real-time class environment.
University of Health and Sciences of Cambodia (UHSC) started its SOI Asia site.
